title: The dark side of public schooling
author: VD
content_html: I expect this story about a dozen elementary school girls being abused will be broadcast on CBS News any day now. That’s only 2.4 times as many families involved as Dan Rather required to slander the homeschooling movement on October 13th.
content_text:
I expect this story about
a dozen elementary school girls being abused
will be broadcast on CBS News any day now.  That’s only 2.4 times as many families involved as Dan Rather required to slander the homeschooling movement on October 13th.
